Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street between the Lyanden Castle on the east and the Darmanian Memorial Park, on the west side of the road.
Room.LongDescription: Both the entrance to the Castle and to the Darmanian Memorial Park are located to the north along Rosecrest Street. The Castle supports most of the people of the land, providing order and justice. Although anyone may enter the Castle, only very powerful characters seek to train in such an honorable place.
